p: G bond, G ele and G vdW specify interactions among bonded, electrostatic, and van der Waals states. In contrast, G pol and G npol represent the polar and non-polar interaction to the free energy presumed through precise GB (Generalized Born). This free energy calculation method is widely used by different studies to understand the binding energy of different ligands (Khan et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019).
